mapper.select: select s.* from s_move s INNER JOIN u_vip u on u.id = s.vip_id where u.mobile = #{mobile} ORDER BY s.begin_time DESC;
select s.* from s_move s INNER JOIN u_vip u on u.id = s.vip_id where u.mobile = #{mobile} and s.begin_time like concat(concat('%',#{timeLike}),'%') ORDER BY s.begin_time DESC LIMIT 0,60;
